## Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with an "x" -->

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have run `pnpm lint` and fixed all issues
- [ ] I have run `pnpm format` to format the code

### Documentation

- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md (if applicable)
- [ ] I have added/updated JSDoc comments for new/modified functions

### Testing

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes (`pnpm test`)
- [ ] E2E tests pass locally with my changes (`pnpm e2e`)
- [ ] I have checked the test coverage and it meets the project's standards

### Architecture

- [ ] My changes follow Clean Architecture principles
- [ ] I have maintained proper separation of concerns (domain/application/infrastructure)
- [ ] I have used the Result pattern for error handling
- [ ] I have followed the repository pattern for data access

### Dependencies

- [ ] I have updated package.json if I added new dependencies
- [ ] I have checked that new dependencies are necessary and appropriate
- [ ] I have run `pnpm audit` to check for security vulnerabilities

### Database

- [ ] I have created/updated Prisma migrations (if applicable)
- [ ] I have tested migrations locally
- [ ] I have updated seed data (if applicable)

### Breaking Changes

<!-- If this PR includes breaking changes, describe them here -->
